title: Android 12L finally restores Widevine L1 certification on affected Pixel phones
content:
After months of beta testing, Android 12L is officially out, and as always, Google’s Pixel lineup is the first in line to try out all the new features and improvements that the point release brings along. It appears Android 12L also resolves one of the most annoying issues that has been haunting some Pixel owners

The post Android 12L finally restores Widevine L1 certification on affected Pixel phones appeared first on xda-developers.
description: It looks like the latest Android 12L update has finally restored the Widevine L1 status on some Pixel units. Read on.
